metadata.title: BBC Sessions - Once More With Felix

content.preamble: The setlist of this programme is unknown, as is the order of the fragments below.

text: Now I'm going to give you a second chance. This is the formula in which you can articulate the very worst kind of anxieties, fears, short circuits between all possible relationships, and by singing it with me you'll resolve all those things and everything will be straight. You'll be straighter than you've ever been. You can really look at the person next to you and things will be so good, really.
You who build the altars now
You must not do it any more
For you have not had the vision
And you never have been tempted
By the Devil or the Lord
I will help you if I can
And  may I never need to scorn
The body out of chaos born
